= Interportlet communication =

Ajax Portal supports the following ways for Interportlet communication:
  # Direct usage of JavaScript API of the portlets (Web applications)
  # Usage of Ajax Portal API (Communication Messages (Events)).



== Communication Messages ==

_Communication Messages_ are sent by portlets on clent side using Portlet API. All _Communication Messages_ are stored in Queue. The Queue is implemented on server and client sides. The same message can be stored in both Queues.
